uiitems

Class HiddenItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • uiitems.UIItem
      • uiitems.HiddenItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class HiddenItem
extends UIItem
    A hidden item that will have functionality but will not be displayed
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
